definition.name: Commit Comment
definition.description: Create a comment for a commit on GitHub
definition.author: peter-evans

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The full name of the target repository.

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Relative path of the file to comment on.

inputs.name: position
inputs.description: Line index in the diff to comment on.

inputs.name: comment-id
inputs.description: The id of the comment to update.

inputs.name: body
inputs.description: The comment body. Cannot be used in conjunction with `body-path`.

inputs.name: body-path
inputs.description: The path to a file containing the comment body. Cannot be used in conjunction with `body`.

inputs.name: edit-mode
inputs.description: The mode when updating a comment, "replace" or "append".

inputs.name: append-separator
inputs.description: The separator to use when appending to an existing comment. (`newline`, `space`, `none`)

inputs.name: reactions
inputs.description: A comma or newline separated list of reactions to add to the comment.

inputs.name: reactions-edit-mode
inputs.description: The mode when updating comment reactions, "replace" or "append".

outputs.name: comment-id
outputs.description: The id of the created commit comment
